effects: Hybrid dark damage (6x, ATK & MAG) to all enemies
Reduce resistance to all elements by 30% for 3 turns to all enemies
name: Black Rain

desc_short.0: Dark damage and reduce fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance for all enemies
desc_short.5: Daño oscuro y reduce la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad de todos los enemigos
